message.body: hopefully tears of happiness :-)
well the status refers to the rain
and I fear that is not generally the case
i got that thanks. so did my comment
alas it is not a happy day =|
it's not?
Nope. Crashed the truck earlier today
oh nooooooooo
what happened?
driving in the rain, hydroplaned, countersteered, couldn't regain control, slammed into a median wall
are you ok?
how bad's the truck?
yeah, some bumps and bruises, but Im ok
thanks =)
and the truck?
not so good
I was able to drive it home, once I tore the dumper off that is
but it may be totaled
which would be ideal at this point
well, good it was just you. ideal? do you have good ins. coverage?
yeah its covered, and I just found out that I am some kind of diamond club member so I get one major accident waived
so this is all good news then, right?
I like your attitude
i actually don't think it looks that damaged. how fast were you goin?
I was moving pretty good. It took a nice hit, airbags went off
I was very surprised that I was able to drive it home after the hit it took
so now what? did you make a claim?
are you gonna keep drivin it in the meantime?
I filed a claim online earlier. Nah, I can't drive it like that, Ill drive my other truck
So yeah, I dunno if Im gonna be able to come out this weekend
I just folded about 60% of my wardrobe.
Ok, welll, life happens
i was looking forward to seein you...
juuuust kidddding
another....what?
what a weird joke
It would take another serious collision to stop me
oh come on
admit you're smiling =)
umm, I'm shaking my head b/c your weird, and i'm smiling b/c i like it
ha
well on that note, I need to ask you something
ok, shoot. i was just about to say night night - I'm headed to bed
ah, early night for you
i'm trying to get back on a good track.
its kinda a 3 part question but I will try to keep it short
yeah same here
anyway, its about what you said last night, about how you dont feel I am good for you

just an fyi, my plan for this weekend is to work sat 8-1, then start nailing down the floor after that. i'd be thrilled to get it all nailed down saturday; if it runs into sunday, whatever. the next step would be filling, sanding, and treating. I'll get done what I can, but at somehwat leisurely pace.
ok, go on.
are you gonna say anything else?
lol
hmm...perhaps you didnt get that last one
this is the last thing I got, "anyway, its about what you said last night, about how you dont feel I am good for you"
so last night, you said that you're not sure if I am good for you, and that you always wanted to be w/ someone like you, but you're not sure now
What is it that makes you think Im not good for you, and do you think I am like you?
Well I still want him to have some of the same qualities that I have, but not some of the other ones I have.
geez, sounds like something I would say...
if you want me to be more specific...I don't want someone that is more conservative than I am, because i tend to worry, and I don't want someone that condones that
I shoudl say, "I want someone that doesn't condone that."
And I also have a tendency to over think things...again, I want someone that balances that out a bit.
thats actually kind of general, but ok
lol.
It's weird because you don't come across as either a person that worries or overthinks
you said it well when you said I need balance. I would like someone that balances out my qualities that are extreme
well I worry and overthink all the time
in some respects anyway
worrying and overthinking are not always bad qualities, its just a matter of not letting it control your life
Sometimes I worry that I am going to loose my internet connection =|
but on the other hand, I really enjoy how you can pick me apart, and I think that's because we are so strikingly similiar
back to the Jack poster- I love it, and I find myself telling myself "it's art, not a poster" lol
yeah thats a tough one, Im not crazy about it, and it is kinda art
I didn't ask if you liked it, lol
a "print" as they say
I don't think you are crazy, Larah
but I don't think you are the kind of person that gets hooked on material things, which is what that is
i love it b/c i've had so many great times with jack's music. and i like what he symbolizes.
So I guess I would be a little suprised if you got it, but I would understand.
true, but to me nothing can really compare to that
it's not a tangable thing
anyway...
did I answer you question?
digress
sort of...
part 3 of that is, if you are not looking for a relationship, then what are you looking/hoping for?
well i guess I am ultimately looking for a relationship, but I'm not ready for one.
or more specifically, I do not feel comfortable committing to a relationship with you.
huh, not sure why that would even come up at this point
b/c I was getting the impression that's what you were looking for.
I didnt feel like I implied any commitment
bear in mind where we met, and your history
heres the thing, when I am dating someone, I can get close very quickly
you talk about emotional attachment...
and I can be affectionate
most people don't want that outside of a relationship
b/c it's insecure
but that is how I am when I am dating, and it doesnt mean that I necessarily want a relationship out of it. I just want to enjoy my time with that person
everyone needs to be touched, Larah
ok, cool a difference between us!
the way I deal with emotional attachment is I avoid it.
except for when I feel very very VERY safe
REALLY! I hadnt noticed....
and that is...a friendship with someone I trust, family member I trust, or someone I plan on committing to and having commit to me
and I was feeling that towards you before I left for CO.
but you can't control emotions like that. and anyone can hurt anyone, so you are never really safe
there are probabilities though

no one can predict the future, we dont know what is going to happen, but we can control how we live today. I'd rather enjoy the moment with someone I care about than worry about how its going to end up
yes, but sometimes its more complicated than that
I don't expect anything from you Larah, but I enjoy caring for you, and caressing you, and talking to you, so why wouldn't I
but that is for later, if it even comes to that
why wouldn't you what?
worst case, it doesnt work out. At least you enjoyed the time you had with the person, and have those nice memories
why wouldn't I do those things while we have the chance
tomorrow is never promised, we just dont know, we have to take the opportunity while we have it
eh, i see where you're coming from... but I suppose I ....what's the rigth word here...I value somethings differently than it sounds like you do.
I suppose we are not completely alike
different people
well, duh....but we are having to dig fairly deeply to uncover these differences
this should probably be continued later, its late kiddo
i just took another load of laundry out of the dryer.
I can come by sat afternoon
nice...you're kicking that laundry's ass tonight!
great...I'll look forward to your help and company and mentally prepared to be scrutinized.
I was having trouble getting dressed.
Im assuming that you need to rent the nailer and sander
that is correct.
is there anything you need toolwise? My miter saw may come in handy
you love that miter saw. why would I be cutting miters?
you wouldnt for flooring, but it makes easy, straight cuts too
my parents have a stapler for the asphalt paper, the thing that you hit to tighten boards by the wall, a tapping block....I think we're good.
table saw works too.
but you can obviously bring whatever you'd like
I suppose, I prefer the miter saw
shop vac?
how decide which battled to pick?
got it
battles*
ok, andres. sleep well. glad you're ok after the crash
true, well have a good night with your laundry.
thanks Lar, night night
